page.title: 17 Otley past and present
page.content:
Today Otley is a fairly small village with a few light industries. There is Post Office and General Stores and a coach firm. In the past it was not always so quiet.
Around the Post Office ---------------------- Here was the greatest amount of business and interest. C. O. Jessups grocery and pork shop was noted because he killed his own pigs. Then there was a harness maker who was always kept busy because of the number of horses used on the land. There was Otley Hall which ground farmers corn and supplied grain and maize or peas to be added to the mixture for pig feeding. Then there was the grinding of oats and beans for cattle and horses.
